title: Entrepreneurial Leadership Competency Enhancement through Automotive Industry Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational business management and basic understanding of automotive industry structures
context.additional_context: Designed as microlearning in a smartphone-based mobile environment, enabling effective simulation learning even in limited technological infrastructure.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more conflict management strategies required for real-world business decision-making in an automotive industry simulation environment.
Learners enhance core elements of entrepreneurial mindset (personal control, self-efficacy) by over 20% based on knowledge acquired through simulations.
Learners engage in inter-team negotiation and decision-making processes with over 80% participation in simulation-based collaborative activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
